snippet: Peter Humphrey, the adviser, is the managing director of a risk management consulting firm that has worked for GlaxoSmithKline, the drug company facing graft allegations in China.
abstract: Police in Shanghai arrest British investigator Peter Humphrey, who specialized in advising foreign investors on business risks in China; he is managing director of ChinaWhys, risk management consulting firm that has done work for GlaxoSmithKline, drug company facing graft and bribery allegations in China.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley and Keith Bradsher contributed reporting from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: Peter Humphrey, the adviser, is the managing director of a risk management consulting firm that has worked for GlaxoSmithKline, the drug company facing graft allegations in China.

headline.main: China Arrests British Adviser Hired by GlaxoSmithKline
headline.print_headline: China Arrests British Adviser Hired by GlaxoSmithKline
